Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 67th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/1/2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/17/2015, off Raul Testa (CHI)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2015, going 6-0, 1.87...
Injured on 5/19/2016 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/24/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $7,995,000 per year...
